title: [Self-Directed] Case-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing the Quality of Higher Education in South Africa

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of higher education systems and foundational knowledge of educational policy
context.additional_context: A non-degree course for adult learners analyzing South African university cases to explore educational quality improvement strategies. Operated with formative assessments in a BYOD environment, focusing on practical applicability as most learners are job seekers.

learning_goals: They can identify and explain three or more educational quality issues at South African universities through case studies.
They can present on the current status of South African universities compared to international educational quality standards.
They can design and propose resource allocation and teacher capacity-building plans in teams.

resources: International Higher Education Quality Metrics Data

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
